Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Asim tuhanu kausara (janata di nahira) bakhasa diti
Tam apane raba la'i namaza parho ate kurabani (ti'aga) karo
Besaka tuhada vairi hi be-aulada rahega. (Bhava usa da nisana baki nahim rahega)
